meta.content: Stark High School is a college and career focused high school for students aged 15-21 looking for success in a unique alternative to the traditional high school setting.
Stark High School is a college and career focused high school for students aged 15-21 looking for success in a unique alternative to the traditional high school setting.

div.p: Stark students will have the opportunity to experience academic success combined with cognitive, emotional and social development. We strive to achieve this in a highly structured, disciplined, safe and caring environment. We aim to cultivate leaders who are well-rounded and productive citizens. We will accomplish this by setting high standards, incorporating innovative programs and encouraging parental involvement. We are built on a holistic philosophy that emphasizes a positive sense of self and a concept of moral and purposeful living.

div.p: We believe in rigor, respect, and responsibility as our core values, which guide the decisions we make and help us to maintain our high expectations and standards throughout the school.

div.p: Come in for a tour of our building, or give us a call at 234-214-4140, weekdays between 8 am and 3 pm. We can't wait to see you!
